pages.title: Starters
pages.text: You start with:$(br)$(li)4 Breads$(li)4 Apples$(li)1 Purified Water Bottle$(li)1 Campfire

pages.title: Water
pages.text: Fill up the given Bottle with Water and place it on the Campfire.$(br)After some time you get Purified Water which you can drink savely.$(br2)Read more about $(l:patchouli:get_started/water_entry)Water$(/l).
Craft yourself a Crafting Rock that acts like a Crafting Table.$(br2)Use it to make your first Tools.$(br2)$(o)I belive in you Stone Age Man !

pages.title: First Tools
pages.text: You have probably noticed that you can't break Logs with your hands.$(br2)You need to craft a Flint Axe first.

pages.title: Level up
pages.text: If you have enough exp, your character levels up. You can now apply one skill point to a category.$(br2)Decide wisely!$(br2)We recommend to skill the smithing category.$(br)(Furnace use)$(br2)Read more about $(l:patchouli:get_started/skills_entry)Skills$(/l).

pages.title: Pick a job
pages.text: Pick a job and gain even more exp.$(br2)You can have a maximum of 2 Jobs at the same time.$(br2)Read more about $(l:patchouli:coins/jobs_entry)Jobs$(/l).
